topics.body:
Okay so I just had a blast from the past about this movie I would watch as a kid.  this orange ant who wears a blue baseball cap has to go on this quest because apparently ants have to earn their abdomens. So he finds this crystal ball that he thinks is his abdomen and light shines on it and blinds him (his pupils completely disappear) so he's just blind, crying and lost in a cave by himself and I honest to god can't remember what else happens. 

Does anyone else remember this madness?
